version_description:
¡Gracias por descargar la aplicación de CaixaBank!

Esta nueva versión incluye mejoras de rendimiento. ¡Esperamos que sigas disfrutando de la aplicación!
Esta versión incorpora mejoras de rendimiento y resolución de incidencias menores. ¡Esperamos que sigas disfrutando de la aplicación!
Esta versión incorpora accesos rápidos mediante 3D Touch (en dispositivos que soportan esta tecnología) y mejoras de rendimiento. ¡Esperamos que sigas disfrutando de la app!

Con cada nueva versión de CaixaBank mejoramos la experiencia de usuario en base a vuestros comentarios y sugerencias. Te informaremos aquí y dentro de la aplicación de las nuevas funcionalidades y servicios que añadamos.

Con cada nueva versión de CaixaBank mejoramos la experiencia de usuario en base a vuestros comentarios y sugerencias. Te informaremos aquí y dentro de la aplicación de las nuevas funcionalidades y servicios que añadamos.

Con cada nueva versión de CaixaBank mejoramos la experiencia de usuario en base a vuestros comentarios y sugerencias. Te informaremos aquí y dentro de la aplicación de las nuevas funcionalidades y servicios que añadamos.

The CaixaBank app has now been adapted for the new iOS 11. Thanks to your suggestions, with every new version of CaixaBank we are improving the user experience. Upgrade now, and don’t forget to give us a 5-star rating if you’re happy with the app!

The new version of the Caixabank app supports the new iPhone X and enables login with Face ID. With every new version of Caixabank, we improve user experience based on your suggestions. Update the app and don't forget to give us 5 stars if you are happy with the service!

We are pleased to present our new app. It is designed to make your daily operations easier and it also contains new features.

-Completely new design.
-Everything at a glance: See your balance, latest purchases, bills, savings and much more in the same place and just one click away.
-Customisable: Create shortcuts to the features you use the most.
-Neo, the new Artificial Intelligence online assistant that will answer all your queries. Ask him by voice or by text message!
-Customised alerts so you can track your finances better.
-Widget to view your balance without logging on to the app.

We hope you like it!
Upgrade it now, and don’t forget to give us a 5-star rating if you’re happy with the app!

We continue improving the app! Many have told us that with the latest update you could not change your user.  In this version, has been corrected it! Please, update the app to keep enjoying it.
We continue improving the app!  In this version, some of the defects that you report us has been corrected ! Please, update the app to keep enjoying it.
We continue improving the app!  In this version, we’ve fixed some bugs you have been reporting to us. Please, update the app to keep enjoying it!
We continue improving the app!  In this version, some of the defects that you report us has been corrected ! Please, update the app to keep enjoying it.
We continue improving the app!  In this version, some of the defects that you report us has been corrected ! Please, update the app to keep enjoying it.

We continue improving the app!
- Now it’s easier to add funds to prepaid cards
- It’s also easier to add funds to your account if you have a credit card.
- Push notifications have been added in your MailBox so that you can check them without leaving the App.
- You’ll be able to check your mortgage request status from now on.
- We’ve fixed some bugs that you’ve reported us.

We keep working on the next update so that your experience with it improves everyday!

We continue improving the app!
- You can now make international transfers
- Plan your future comfortably and easily with Cuenta CaixaFuturo. Now it is still easier to purchase the product
- Now it is easier to apply for a savings insurance to live with peace of mind.
- We’ve fixed some bugs that you’ve reported us.

We keep working on the next update so that your experience with it improves everyday!

We continue improving the app!
- You can now make international transfers
- Plan your future comfortably and easily with Cuenta CaixaFuturo. Now it is still easier to purchase the product
- Now it is easier to apply for a savings insurance to live with peace of mind.
- We’ve fixed some bugs that you’ve reported us.

We keep working on the next update so that your experience with it improves everyday!

We continue improving the app! In this version we improve the notifications so that it is easier for you to consult all the notices that you receive in the App. In addition we’ve fixed some bugs that you’ve reported us.
We keep working on the next update so that your experience with it improves everyday!

We continue improving the app! In this version we improve the notifications so that it is easier for you to consult all the notices that you receive in the App. In addition we’ve fixed some bugs that you’ve reported us.
We keep working on the next update so that your experience with it improves everyday!

We are still improving this application!
- You can now cancel transfers.
- We have improved the All my products section to give you quicker access to your products, including those you have in other banks.
- You can now pay your credit card installment in advance.
- We have also corrected some small issues you have reported.
Right now we're working on the next update to make sure you enjoy it even more.

We keep improving the app!

- Now it’s easier to see your credit card payments and personalize the payment method as well.

- We have also fixed some small issues you have reported.

Right now we're working on the next update to make sure you enjoy the app even more.

It's summer but at CaixaBank we do not stop and we continue working to incorporate great updates so you like the app every day much more.

- New section My income and expenses. You will be able to know at a glance how much you have spent and entered each month.
- Do you have an account and card in another bank? Add them to your CaixaBank Now App and control all your finances without switching apps.
- Investing is no longer an expert thing. You can now have a personalized fund portfolio managed by an expert. Join the investment of the future with Smart Money.
- New Visa & Pay card, the best of the credit and debit advantages on the same card.
- We’ve improved the correspondence section to make viewing your communications much easier.
- In addition, now it is much easier to simulate the share of your mortgage.

If you like news and you rate us with 5 stars we will be happy this holiday.
Happy summer!

It's summer but at CaixaBank we do not stop and we continue working to incorporate great updates so you like the app every day much more.

- New section My income and expenses. You will be able to know at a glance how much you have spent and entered each month.
- Do you have an account and card in another bank? Add them to your CaixaBank Now App and control all your finances without switching apps.
- Investing is no longer an expert thing. You can now have a personalized fund portfolio managed by an expert. Join the investment of the future with Smart Money.
- New Visa & Pay card, the best of the credit and debit advantages on the same card.
- We’ve improved the correspondence section to make viewing your communications much easier.
- In addition, now it is much easier to simulate the share of your mortgage.

If you like news and you rate us with 5 stars we will be happy this holiday.
Happy summer!

Summer is over and we are back with more news at CaixaBankNow:

- Have you made a mistake on a transfer? Don’t worry we have added the option to cancel transfers, both national and international.
- Are you thinking of buying a house but you don’t know how much you can afford? Calculate it with the new Home Buying Simulator.
- It has never been so easy to sign your transactions! Forget about the coordinates card and sign with the CaixaBank Sign app. With this new version we have improved the experience to make it much more convenient for you.
- And as always we’ve fixed small bugs that you have been mentioning to us.

By the way! We are celebrating that CaixaBankNow App has been awarded by The Banker on the BAI Global Innovation Awards for its technological innovation and for the best mobile experience.
We continue working on the next update to make your day to day better. If you like us please rate us with 5 stars!
Thank you very much

In this update we introduce you new features that will surely help you in your day to day:

• Bizum in Now! For all of you who requested it, is finally here!. From now on you will be able to pay or request money through Bizum without leaving the app.

• We have listened to you and we have corrected small errors to help you in your day to day life. Update the application and you will be up to date with the latest functionalities.

Don't forget that if you like our app, you can rate us with 5 stars.

We bring the most refreshing news!

• Travelling abroad? The new travel insurance alerts you so that you can take it out even when you are at your destination. Insure against any inconvenience right from the start.

• Find everything you need to enjoy a dream holiday. Rent a car, book accommodation, reserve foreign currency and much more.

And as always, we have done some improvements and fixed small bugs to keep you enjoying the app.

Do you like our application? Rate us with 5 stars ;)

Summer is coming!

• Do you have your hollidays ready? Now we make it easier for you. Everything you need for travelling within the app: reservation of accommodation, car rental, travel insurance, reservation of foreign currency and much more...

By the way, before you go on vacation, do not forget to give us 5 stars if you like the App.

Hello

The arrival of spring brings more updates for the app!

• You can now request a personal loan in just a few steps and learn the result of your request instantly.

• We're unveiling a new design for the "Travel with Booking" section in Compra Estrella, making it easier than ever to book your trips on the app.

• New travel insurance so that you can always travel with total peace of mind, knowing that any unexpected events that may arise are covered.

• Track the status of your mortgage application and manage all the procedures simply: send documentation, speak with your adviser whenever you need and check the status of your application.

• We've also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

We'll be back soon with more!

We're beginning the year full of energy and new features!

Now you can anticipate your future payments and see all your upcoming bills to have total control of your finances.
All your products, from whichever bank, in the same place. See at a glance all the information on all your banks to have a quick, clear view of how much you have and how much you owe in each of the banks and in total.
Remember you can set up your favourite transfers to send money more quickly without having to fill in all the information each time. Now you can see them all directly in “Operate” and send them with a single click.

We've also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app. We'll be back soon with more new features!

We keep improving the app!

We have fixed some issues you have reported.

Please, update the app's version to continue enjoying it.

Thank you very much

Check out the new features we bring you this Autumn!

● Are you planning a trip? Now you can book it on Booking.com from the app and we’ll refund you 4% of your stay. Your can find this option in the new section "Travel with Booking" at Compra Estrella.
We’ve improved the experience of requesting a prior appointment with your advisor.
● Besides, we’ve made some improvements and bug fixes to make your CaixaBankNow experience that much slicker!
● Don’t forget to rate us with 5 stars if you like the app.

Ah, and stay tuned, there’s more good stuff coming from us soon. We are positive you will love them!

See you soon!

We keep improving the app!

We have fixed some issues you have reported.

Please, update the app's version to continue enjoying it.

Thank you very much

BlackFriday, CyberMonday, December Bank Holidays, Christmas, a Sky TV pass... in the upcoming months you will certainly be spending more, so we are sure that the new Informe now will prove useful! Thanks to this report, you will be able to see how much you have spent and saved each month, on what you have spent the most, and how your spending has changed when compared to the previous month or year. And, if you have added other banks, you'll be able to see Informe Now with all the information added.

We have also fixed some bugs that you reported.

We are still working on the next update to make your day-to-day better.
If you like the app, don't forget to give it a 5-star rating!

Ho, ho, ho...

Our wish this Christmas is for you to have the best time ever. That's why we are back with lots of new features to make your everyday routine even easier.

●We add 4 new Siri shortcuts to let you quickly do your everyday tasks. Make transfers, search for your nearest branch, block your card or sign up for our products in just one click.

●Are you self-employed? Now you have access to Quipu, the new accounting solution.

●We've also made some small design tweaks and corrected some errors that you brought to our attention.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

Merry Christmas! See you in 2019

We're beginning the year full of energy and new features!

Now you can anticipate your future payments and see all your upcoming bills to have total control of your finances.
All your products, from whichever bank, in the same place. See at a glance all the information on all your banks to have a quick, clear view of how much you have and how much you owe in each of the banks and in total.
Remember you can set up your favourite transfers to send money more quickly without having to fill in all the information each time. Now you can see them all directly in “Operate” and send them with a single click.

We've also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app. We'll be back soon with more new features!

We have more exciting news.

● Do you use different devices to make payments? Card, iPhone, Apple watch, wristband, etc. We have unveiled a new design in My Cards and you will now find all your payment methods grouped by contract. This will give you an overall view when you have linked various devices.

● With the new income and spending filters, you will find it easier than ever to get a grip of your finances, because you can analyse your income and spending by years, half-years or quarters and filter them by account and card.

● We've also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

We''ll be back soon with more!

We have more exciting news.



• Do you use different devices to make payments? Card, iPhone, Apple watch, wristband, etc. We have unveiled a new design in My Cards and you will now find all your payment methods grouped by contract. This will give you an overall view when you have linked various devices.


• With the new income and spending filters, you will find it easier than ever to get a grip of your finances, because you can analyse your income and spending by years, half-years or quarters and filter them by account and card.


• We've also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.


Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.



We''ll be back soon with more!

Hello

The arrival of spring brings more updates for the app!

• You can now request a personal loan in just a few steps and learn the result of your request instantly.

• We're unveiling a new design for the "Travel with Booking" section in Compra Estrella, making it easier than ever to book your trips on the app.

• New travel insurance so that you can always travel with total peace of mind, knowing that any unexpected events that may arise are covered.

• Track the status of your mortgage application and manage all the procedures simply: send documentation, speak with your adviser whenever you need and check the status of your application.

• We've also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

We'll be back soon with more!

We are constantly improving the app!

• Create budgets to control what you spend, and remain within your set limits each month.

• Discover the new offering of reconditioned Compra Estrella products, at a lower price than the original and with the same guarantees as a new product.

• You can now get your home security alarm with Compra Estrella.

• We have increased the catalogue of insurance policies so you now have dental insurance available.

We have also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

We'll be back soon with more!

We are constantly improving the app!

• The new range of MyBox Auto, Home and Life insurance policies is now available, so you can feel protected at all times.

• We have added the new pet insurance, so your best friend is protected at all times.

• Track the status of your loan application without having to go to a branch and manage all the procedures simply. Send the documentation, speak with your adviser whenever you need and check the status of your application.

• Choose the amount from which you want to automatically pay by instalments your card transactions.

• We have also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

We are constantly improving the app!

• The new range of MyBox Auto, Home and Life insurance policies is now available, so you can feel protected at all times.

• We have also made some improvements and corrected a few small things to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

We are constantly improving the app!

• Summer is coming! With the new trip insurance you will get a noltification when you leave the country and you will be able to insure your trip in your destination, being covered from the first day.

• Swipe any transaction on My Accounts and on My MoneyBoxes and you will find out new direct actions.

• Enjoy the new design of the "More" section where you will find all what you need.

• We have also made some improvements and corrected a few small things as one that was blocking transfers with VoiceOver to make your experience much better.

Don't forget to give us 5 stars if you like the app.

Summer is coming!

• Do you have your hollidays ready? Now we make it easier for you. Everything you need for travelling within the app: reservation of accommodation, car rental, travel insurance, reservation of foreign currency and much more...

By the way, before you go on vacation, do not forget to give us 5 stars if you like the App.

By the way, before you go on vacation, do not forget to give us 5 stars if you like the App.

We bring the most refreshing news!

• Travelling abroad? The new travel insurance alerts you so that you can take it out even when you are at your destination. Insure against any inconvenience right from the start.

• Find everything you need to enjoy a dream holiday. Rent a car, book accommodation, reserve foreign currency and much more.

And as always, we have done some improvements and fixed small bugs to keep you enjoying the app.

Do you like our application? Rate us with 5 stars ;)

We work hard to offer you new features!

• Avoid curious glances around you with the new Discreet mode that will hide your most sensitive data.

• Always find your bills with the new search engine.

• We have improved the experience so that you can request a previous appointment with your manager.

• We adapt to the new European directive PSD2.

And don't forget that if you like our app, you can rate us with 5 stars ;)

With this version we have fixed some bugs reported by users last week.

Also remember that we launch the following improvements:

• Avoid curious glances around you with the new Discreet mode that will hide your most sensitive data.

• Always find your bills with the new search engine.

• We have improved the experience so that you can request a previous appointment with your manager.

• We adapt to the new European directive PSD2.

And don't forget that if you like our app, you can rate us with 5 stars ;)

In this update we introduce you new features that will surely help you in your day to day:

• Bizum in Now! For all of you who requested it, is finally here!. From now on you will be able to pay or request money through Bizum without leaving the app.

• We have listened to you and we have corrected small errors to help you in your day to day life. Update the application and you will be up to date with the latest functionalities.

Don't forget that if you like our app, you can rate us with 5 stars.

Winter is coming ... and with it we bring you new improvements in the app.

• We have added new features that will make it easier for you to review and manage your receipts.

• Do you have a pension plan? Now you can make contributions more easily and quickly.

• We have also made some improvements and corrected a few small little things (sonrisa)

BTW don't forget to rate us with 5 stars if you like our app.

At CaixaBank we want to wish you a very happy New Year. To complete the year in the best way, we bring you some improvements in the app.

• Now in My accounts, in addition to your CaixaBank accounts, you will see the detail of your other aggregated bank accounts.

• Save the movements of your accounts or cards in PDF and / or Excel.

• We have made improvements to the My advisor's Wall to make your experience more personalized.
Do you like the app? Rate us with 5 *

We kick off the new year with a bunch of improvements, in addition to having corrected some small errors to make your experience much better.

Do you like the app? Rate us with 5 *

We have more exciting news!

• Voice-controlled banking! The new Neo gives you a unique experience using just your voice.

• View all your accounts and cards from your other banks. You will have a clear and easy view of all your products in one place.

Don't forget to rate us with 5 stars if you like our app.

We have more exciting news!

• Voice-controlled banking! The new Neo gives you a unique experience using just your voice.

• View all your accounts and cards from your other banks. You will have a clear and easy view of all your products in one place.

Don't forget to rate us with 5 stars if you like our app.

We have news to make your day to day easier.

• Find everything you need to move freely around your city: Renting, financing and insurance your vehicle, purchase a scooter, and much more.

• You can now protect your home with SegurCaixa Home insurance with maximum coverage.

• Now, in just two step, calculate your loans easily and quickly.

• And remember you can make a BIZUM without leaving the app.

Do you like the app? Rate us with 5 *

We have news to make your day to day easier.

• Find everything you need to move freely around your city: Renting, financing and insurance your vehicle, purchase a scooter, and much more.
• You can now protect your home with SegurCaixa Home insurance with maximum coverage.
• Now, in just two step, calculate your loans easily and quickly.
• And remember you can make a BIZUM without leaving the app.

Do you like the app? Rate us with 5 *

At this time, what is most important is you and your nearest and dearest, which is why we want to improve your experience by adapting the app to suit your needs so that you can carry out all your tasks from home.

• Consult your fiscal notifications for the 2019 income taxes in the messages section.

• Confirm your draft 2019 tax return with ease.

• Ask Neo and manage your personal finances with our virtual assistant.

• Request a quote from MyBox auto and benefit from all its advantages.

You are also reminded that your adviser is there to help you in whatever you need.

Do you like the app? Rate us 5*

We are constantly improving the app!

• You can now BIZUM your friends with Siri.

• We are launching a new design for account transactions, cards, bills and income and expenses.

• We improved the experience so withdrawing cash from an ATM without a card is easier than ever before.

• And you can now take out car insurance and enjoy all the advantages.

Remember that your adviser is there for you to help with whatever you need.

Do you like the app? Give us 5 stars

We are constantly working to improve the app for you!

• We have enhanced the browsing experience and incorporated visual charts to help you keep track of your bills and expenses.

• You can now take out our new home alarm or senior protection insurance plans.

• Discover the advantages of the new CaixaFuturo savings insurance.

• We will also send a notification to your home screen if you have any unread messages from your advisor.

Do you like the app? Give us 5 stars

• You can now take out our new home alarm or senior protection insurance plans.

• Discover the advantages of the new CaixaFuturo savings insurance.

• We also incorporated a new direct access to your advisor space so that you can access more comfortably.

Summer is here, and we've got some exciting news!

• Neo keeps growing! Ask our virtual assistant about all your bills and sent and received transfers.
• Do you need to reject a fraudulent payment or double charge? You can now do this in the card transaction details section.
• You can search for your Auto Renting by category in our extended offer, and apply online.

Hey! And if you like the app, we'd really appreciate a 5-star rating.

Summer is here, and we've got some exciting news!

• You can activate and talk to Neo, by saying "Hello Neo!". You can also consult all your bills and sent and received transfers.
• Do you need to reject a fraudulent payment or double charge? You can now do this in the card transaction details section.
• You can search for your Auto Renting by category in our extended offer, and apply online.

If you like the app, do you rate us with 5 *?

We're starting September with our batteries fully charged!

• Our engines have been running all summer. With this latest update, we have fixed several errors that you reported to help with your day-to-day and offer the best possible user experience.
• In addition, finding the Renting Auto car rental you are looking for will now be easier thanks to the new vehicle categories and images. Now you can apply online!

Our wish this Christmas is for you to have the best time ever.

• We know how important your time is, so we are improving the system for you to request an appointment with your adviser.
• Customise the section for upcoming bills, eliminating those you no longer want to see.

Welcome spring! We hope you enjoy the good weather and our new products:

• You can now activate your cards in Apple Pay conveniently from the CaixaBankNow app.
• In the next few days, you will have access the new space, Moments, which will offer you benefits and discounts for being a customer.
• We improve the experience of making payments and viewing those you have already made.
• Neo continues to evolve and is becoming smarter! you can now consult your branch and block your cards directly by talking to the assistant.

We have lots of new features this month!

• Now you can record your biometrics and withdraw money from ATMs without using your PIN, just with your face.
• Can't you live without your mobile phone? Discover Smart Protect, the new insurance policy for your mobile phone.
• Ask Noa for your account balance or your salary payments. Plus, if you have a withheld balance, you can see the details and reason for the withholding.
• Do you have investment products? With this new version, you can now complete the Knowledge and Experience test (MiFID) from My Profile.

We are constantly improving the app:

• You can now transfer the bills you have in other banks to CaixaBankNow to manage them easily and quickly in one place.
• From now on, when you access CaixaBankNow from your iPad®, you will see the same app as on your mobile phone, enjoying far more features and services than before.
